title: New program will teach tech skills to ex-offenders seeking work following incarceration - BizTimes Milwaukee
content: New program will teach tech skills to ex-offenders seeking work following incarceration  BizTimes Milwaukee
description: Milky Way Tech Hub and The Way Out (a Milwaukee-based, non-bias employment platform) are launching a joint program aimed at educating individuals returning home from incarceration and giving them the skills in technology they need to successfully find work.
